website_summaries.verdict: Newest top-of-the-line smartphone from one of the most trusted names in mobile.
pros: As improvements are introduced in quality of mobile service and video/audio, this device is ready for them
cons: Questions around 5G availability both now and in the future
8K video services are slowly being rolled out

customer_reviews.title: galaxy ultra 5g
customer_reviews.text: Its about time. Bundle is an amazing option because i miss pre orders. Also, it's finally compatible with all phone services in America. T MOBILE, VERIZON, ATT. Phone is amazing. 120hz screen. Biggest battery. The packaged was practically new, didn't look like anyone used it beforehand too. I've had some bad experiences with ordering Samsung phones on Amazon, but not this time. Glad I tooked the risk. Just to be clear these come with the regular galaxy buds and not the +
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is absolutely horrible. I simply can't believe Samsung released this phone with a camera this bad touting how amazing it supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: wckyjaci

customer_reviews.title: $1499 Focus Hunter--even w/the latest software update "fix"
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have the latest update installed & still have focusing issues. This $1400 S20 Ultra is going back to Amazon for a REFUND. The Display is nice but the camera is WAY overrated & the S20 Ultra camera software is TRASH>>>NO "APERTURE" MODE?????? Samsung, WHAT were you thinking?????? Buying a Huawei P40 Pro instead>>>VASTLY superior camera & YES, it DOES HAVE a dedicated "APERTURE" MODE!
customer_reviews.author: HKUSPc

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: I have received the S20 but not 5G, am really unhappy 😔
customer_reviews.author: hilal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to hype - $1500 paperweight
customer_reviews.text: I'm just not as impressed as I anticipated with this phone. To me, the photos are just marginally better than my Pixel3. I do like the longer battery life. I'm probably not buying another flagship at release ever again. We're reached the point of dominishing returns with phones and features. 3 months later and I still maintain the same sentiment. I want my money back. There's so many bugs and flaws in this over priced paper weight
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Works better after some updates
customer_reviews.text: Receive everything i pre-ordered, earbuds,wireless charger and phone. Just receive Update/fix today 3/21/20 on US Boost Mobile,but the auto focus issues continue,that specific update has nothing to deal with the camera issue. Update: Just receive 2 updates 1 for security and 1 for camera app,phone working way much better 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone! Loved it except for:
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty incredible! My only gripes: sometimes the wireless charging capabilities would not work, and I'd have to move the phone around a bunch to hit the sweet spot, and that since the camera is so large, it sticks out. I had the otterbox defender case on it, and my camera still shattered somehow in my pocket... So be very careful with it, or get a designated screen protector for the camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: Clark James

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Should have never downgraded to this phone. I had the Note 9 and it was great but I believed the hype and screwed up. Paid so much money and didn't feel like an upgrade. Don't waste your money if you have a Note 9, 8 or Galaxy 8 or 9.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Chavez

customer_reviews.title: We expected more
customer_reviews.text: This order was a gift. We’ve had iPhones, Xiaomi phones and Huawei phones. All of them have some feature that shines and makes you get exited about them. This phone is particular is great looking, takes great photos, but battery life is just disappointing. It cannot keep up with phones from other brands, falling even behind our family’s iPhones...
customer_reviews.author: Lovozeto

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect SLR but don't pass for the rest of life's moments
customer_reviews.text: bought amazon used for great discount. Did find small scratch on glass but not noticeable in normal use. Still debating if its a deal breaker. Had S8+ with crack in top corner and across top. Besides cameras dont see much of a difference for normal use. The cameras are different then My SLR so not great comparison as they both have their uses. Will you be able to get 20x30 printouts with great color, probably not. You will have a phone to catch the 95percent of other life moments with amazing social postings and updates to family. Great low light that will capture the moment. And prolly a great 5x7.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone original packaging! Love it! Now for 5 G to get full use!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great phone after getting it all set up it seems original and 100% real! Expense if you want to go for a cheaper phone look up ZTE phones the work fast and great too! Want cheaper cell service look up visible cell service! Easy sim card install and start! But the samsung S20 Ultra runs fast and smooth so far!
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Failure phone not worth for the money, get something else.
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of use the S20 Ultra, I am very disappointed the finger print sensor, Samsung you have failed on this device. The photo auto focus is the worsted on smart phone because it is a very stupid to use especially when you use the camera with Amazon Flex apps. The battery not for the whole day of use failure big time.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Luu

customer_reviews.title: Phone seems good but I cant connect to anything using data
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried contacting support over this but havent been able to get any help. Ever since ive had the phone I can only connect to the internet if Im at home using wifi. If I leave my house and try to connect using data then I cant use the internet at all pretty much making the phone worthless. Disappointing result for the amount of money I spent on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: An update seemed to fix the fault... Received with a faulty screen.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever. I love it. It is expensive but it is worthy
customer_reviews.author: ay

customer_reviews.title: eSim is not available at this model
customer_reviews.text: I need phone with two sim cards and I thought that this particular one will give me ability to have one sim card on board and second as a eSim. And this seller didn't give clear explanation about it. I definitely will return it.
customer_reviews.author: inzheneher

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S20 Ultra is excellent and I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am from the Middle East region, specifically from Kuwait ... The Samsung S20 ultra 5G device works perfectly .. but when switching to the Arabic language, half of the device is in English and the other half in Arabic and the software Qualcomm Snapdragon
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad radhi

customer_reviews.title: Everything is glass get a good case. Turn on performance mode.
customer_reviews.text: 3 days in I love the device. If the deal with the buds and duo charger is still going on I would suggest to shop on a desktop as there will be options for insurance, on mobile you only have one choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes some time to focus close, but I can handle it. For the rest, I transfered all my old S9 settings to this one in 9 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Tech

customer_reviews.title: screen comes pre-cracked :-(
customer_reviews.text: Front glass came with a small crack and the phone is supposedly brand new, doesn't effect the functionality and its small but its a crack in a 1000 dollar plus phone so that was a pretty big let down...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came in brand new as stated!!
customer_reviews.text: I love big phone's and this one is a beast this is definitely a 5 star rating I don't know why people are leaving so many negative comments 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Leeton Holness

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the speed that my phone arrived. It's a beautiful phone and I know I will enjoy my new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wells

customer_reviews.title: Languages
customer_reviews.text: The phone does not have Russian, I need it for work.
customer_reviews.author: Yury Ramanau

customer_reviews.title: This phone is so worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it charges super fast and then the battery life last and last. Plus the camera such clarity omg!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: the phone is excellent just that the battery is not as strong as expected.
customer_reviews.author: princewill

customer_reviews.title: My phone was purchased with 128 GB of memory but arrive without any memory in the bay.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to wait for storage as my phone did not arrive with any memory as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: rumob07419

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone so much just getting the feel for the phone right now
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Domingurz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I go camping a lot so the camera is a great feature to document my trips. The phone is very quick, responsive, and the pictures come out crystal clear. Overall it's definitely a big upgrade with the new features. The battery lasts a long time however the phone is much heavier and a little more difficult to hold than it's predecessors. The finger print reader is also not easy to use when there is a screen protector on. Overall I'm really satisfied with this phone
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lee

customer_reviews.title: Severely scratched screen upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I cant take a picture of my phone with my phone unfortunately but the device showed up with a badly scratched screen. For a new phone that I paid $1200 for it should have been in flawless condition. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Phone is as fine as all the other Samsung phones , bought this for the camera and size . Love it so far- two months in. Would recommend this seller for sure , good price and quick delivery.Real Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: L. fawcett

customer_reviews.title: "This phone is the best ever!"
customer_reviews.text: l will add this wonderful product to my collection of useful things to improve the quality of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone for the month I had it and it got stolen....
customer_reviews.author: randy burns durney

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Order a USA version and have a different version that don't work in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: bad Camera quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bad Camera quality, AutoFocuse are miserable, pictures look like from 90s .
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer213

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G Factory Unlocked New Android Cell Phone US Version | 128GB of Storage | Fingerprint ID and Facial Recognition | Long-Lasting Battery | US Warranty
product_meta.description: Style:S20 Ultra| Color:Cosmic Black| Size:128GBThe ultimate 5G powerhouse with an unparalleled new camera and unprecedented 100x Space Zoom. Bring a pro-level studio wherever you go with Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G's super-speed processing and complete pro kit of camera features – including the groundbreaking 100x Space Zoom and cutting-edge AI – in an immersive 6. 9” Infinity-O display. Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G’s modern design gives you a cinematic experience and enhanced viewing comfort with next-level functionality. Take pro-quality, hi-res images and video with a full system of studio lenses with super stabilization a groundbreaking 108MP camera system that captures millions of more pixels in each shot. Features like the Single Take AI make it quick and easy to capture multiple photos and video with a single tap. Zoom in super close, even from 300 feet away, and capture pro-grade video and dazzling photos at night, even without flash, with Ultra Bright Night mode. Share your content in real time with double-tap sharing and get hours of power from minutes of charge with Super Fast Charging. Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G’s intelligent battery lasts all day to power every scroll, click, call, tap, playlist and season finale. Do more of what you love with the device that gives you more.
feature_bullets: Power of 5G: Get next-level power for everything you love to do with Samsung Galaxy 5G; Share more, game harder, experience more and never miss a beat
Single Take AI: Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button; Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time
Hi-Res Camera Zoom: Capture hi-res images from 300 feet away that look like they were taken from 3 feet away; The game-changing new 100x Space Zoom delivers unprecedented power and clarity
Ultra Bright Night Mode: Capture pro-quality content in Ultra Bright Night mode to capture dazzling, blur-free photos and vivid HRD video without flash, even in low light

Super Fast Charging: Charge up quicker with Super Fast Charge so you can keep moving, with more juice; Give your buds – or Galaxy Buds – a boost of power with Wireless PowerShare right from Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G
All-Day Battery: S20 Ultra 5G’s intelligent battery uses an algorithm to learn from how you live to optimize power and take you through a day or more of work and life without ever giving out on you
Massive Storage: Generous storage out of the box and expandable memory means you never have to delete what’s important to you; Memory card sold separately
Included Components: Screen Protector Leaflet, Smart Switch Insert, Quick Reference Manual, Terms & Conditions/ Health & Safety Guide
